item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - j-hope - Jack In The Box (HOPE Edition) [FLAC 24bits/44.1kHz]
item.description:
Jack In The Box is the solo debut full-length album by J-Hope. It was released on July 15, 2022 with "Arson" serving as the album's title track.



The pre-release single "More" was released on July 1, 2022.

A limited edition vinyl was released on December 12, 2022.[1]

A physical edition (Hope Edition) was released on August 18, 2023



Track list
  1. "Intro" - 0:58
  2. "Pandora's Box" - 2:36
  3. "More" - 3:00
  4. "Stop (세상에 나쁜 사람은 없다)" - 2:02
  5. "= (Equal Sign)" - 1:54
  6. "Music Box : Reflection" - 1:10
  7. "What If..." - 2:16
  8. "Safety Zone" - 2:45
  9. "Future" - 2:19
  10. "Arson (방화)" - 2:39
  11. "Equal Sign (Lollapalooza ver.)" (Hope Edition) - 2:07
  12. "Stop (세상에 나쁜 사람은 없다) (Lollapalooza ver.)" (Hope Edition) - 2:15
  13. "Future (Lollapalooza ver.)" (Hope Edition) - 4:18
  14. "More (Inst.)" (Hope Edition) - 2:58
  15. "Arson (방화)" (Inst.) (Hope Edition) - 2:39
